Description: Vector of ordered inputs to the *k*-means AIF detection algorithm.
Vector of ordered inputs to the fuzzy-c-means AIF detection algorithm.
If the value of this flag is 1, partial volume effects are accounted for. Otherwise, or if not specified, no partial volume effect correction was done.

The full-dose AIF is reconstructed from pre-bolus injection with a smaller dose. If the value of this flag is 1, a dual bolus approach is used. Otherwise, or if not specified, no dual bolus approach is used.

OSIPI name: Arterial partial volume correction factor
Description: A factor that scales signal or indicator concentrations measured in a partial volume affected artery such that partial volume effects are removed. Usually this is estimated by deconvolving arterial and venous signals or indicator concentrations.

OSIPI name: Quantity not listed
Description: This is a custom free-text item, which can be used if a quantity of interest is not listed. Please state a literature reference and request the item to be added to the lexicon for future usage.
